New Records: Mexico achieved a 3-0 victory over New Zealand in their international friendly match on September 7, 2024.
Key Match Events: Mexico scored three goals in the match with Orbelín Pineda, César Huerta, and Luis Romo each contributing to the scoreline.
Pre-Game Insights: The match was an international friendly between Mexico and New Zealand.
Post-Match Reflections: The match ended with Mexico securing a comfortable 3-0 win over New Zealand.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place at 1:00 AM, September 8, 2024, with an attendance of 25,271 fans.
